doc.title: Hootersville
doc.plot: Beverly Hills attorney Orville Donaldson and his socialite wife Liza relocate to Hootersville, a dairy community, where Orville pursues his utterly silly dream to leave the riches and the bitches behind and milk cows. But something about Hootersville has the women busting out all over. Every one is buxom, except for Smantha Drunker, who is considered the town freak because she is the only women in the region who can still see her feet. And she may provide a clue to why Hootersville is so full of hooters.
